home_page.subtitle: As an open cross-chain bridge protocol based on Substrate, Darwinia focuses on the construction of future Internet of Tokens, including decentralized tokens swap, exchange and market
home_page.subscribe_tip: Subscription success! Please check your inbox.
home_page.theme_desc: As an open cross-chain bridge protocol based on Substrate, Darwinia focuses on the construction of future Internet of Tokens, including decentralized tokens swap, exchange and market
home_page.highlight_block_content_2: The Parachain of Polkadot focused on cross-chain token trading
home_page.highlight_block_content_3: The technology that provides support for cross-chain
home_page.economic_block_content_1: The native tokens for Darwinia Network is RING, RING can be used as gas for transactions. Gas include transaction fees, contract execution fees, network bandwidth charges, storage fees, and more.
home_page.economic_block_content_2: To encourage users to make long term commitments and pledge, users can choose to lock RING for 3 - 36 months in the process of Staking, and the system will offer a KTON token as reward for users participating in Staking.
home_page.economic_block_content_3: The Darwinia Network will distribute RING as an incentive to the participants of Staking. The process of Staking can also be understood as the POS mining process, where the miner obtains Staking energy by pledging tokens for POS mining.
home_page.application_block_content_1: Token DEX is a decentralized application based on the Darwinia cross-chain bridge as the core technology, which can realize automatic cross-chain transactions between tokens
home_page.application_block_content_2: The decentralized nft auction market, which supports nft auctions of different blockchain networks through cross-chain auctions, creates a new NFT cross-chain circulation scenario
home_page.dev_content: Do you want to get involved?

faq_page.title: FAQs
faq_page.faq_1_title: What is the relationship between Darwinia Network and Polkadot?
faq_page.faq_1_content: Darwinia Network is the first game chain on Polkadot. The development of Darwinia network is based on Polkadot and Substrate framework. Later Darwin network will become a parachain of the Polkadot network.
faq_page.faq_2_title: What happens if Darwinia Network is no longer a parachain?
faq_page.faq_2_content: Even if Darwinia Network is voted off the Polkadot parachain set, it will still work as a "Solo Chain", where it's responsible for its own security.
faq_page.faq_3_content:
RING is system token of Darwinia Network, the initial supply before Darwinia network mainnet release is 2 billion.
KTON is the staking and governance credential of Darwinia Network, KTON can only obtained by locking RING, the initial supply is 0.
At present, some RING and KTON exist in the Ethereum network and the Tron network in the form of ERC-20 and TRC-20. These TOKENs will be transferred to the Darwinia main network by 1:1 cross-chain conversion after the Darwinia main online.
faq_page.faq_4_title: What is RING and KTON in Evolution Land?
faq_page.faq_4_content: RING and KTON in Evolution Land is the ERC-20/TRC-20 token, Evolution Land will use RING in Darwinia Network as the payment token in game.

brand.title: Darwinia Brand
brand.desc: This page displays the LOGO, icons and other design files of Darwinia Network and Darwinia Crab Network tokens (included: RING, KTON, cRING, cKTON, etc.)
brand.about_desc: Darwinia Network is a decentralized heterogeneous cross-chain bridge protocol developed using Substrate, focusing on decentralized cross-chain token swap, exchange, and market. Darwinia also serves as critical infrastructure for single-chain application upgrades to cross-chain versions, including Defi, Game, DEX, NFT market, etc. Our vision is to build the future Internet of Tokens.
brand.note_1: When using Darwinâ€™s official design documents, please pay attention to the application scenarios:
brand.note_2: 1. Use trendy gradation of the purple logo on white/light background;
brand.note_3: 2. Use the white logo on a dark background;
brand.note_4: 3. Use grey or other color logos if the standard logo is not adept at single color application scene.
brand.note_5: Thank you for your support to Darwinia Network, we hope for pleasant cooperation between us.
